Key Match Events: F. Ioannidis scored two goals for Greece in their 3-0 win over Finland
B. Kallman scored an own goal for Finland in the 38th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Greece's manager will be pleased with their 3-0 win over Finland
Finland's performance was disappointing after being dominated by Greece
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Stadio Karaiskaki on September 7th, 2024
The UEFA Nations League standings after the match showed Greece and England tied at the top with 15 points each
Others: K. Koulierakis was booked for Greece in the 51st minute
M. Peltola was booked for Finland in the 90th minute
